DOC.brief_summary: This study has been designed to conduct as Randomized comparative clinical study.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation of Leech Therapy in the Treatment of Knee Osteoarthritis
DOC.detailed_description: Two groups, group B received Qurse Mafasil tablet orally two tablets two times daily for 8 weeks while group A received Leech therapy once weekly for 8 weeks along with Qurse mafasil.
